attributes.additional_details: Stop loud bangs in fireworks and make them silent or ban them and create laser shows. They are killing and scaring are animals. Dogs are dying from heart attacks it causes unnecessary stress and upset
attributes.background: Stop loud fireworks and make them silent because they are killing our animals and scaring them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
